description: Comprehensive farm food safety requirements covering general operations, site management, ground history, adjacent land risks, chemical control, training, field worker hygiene, agricultural water management, soil amendments, equipment sanitation, and harvest practices. Aligned with official PrimusGFS v4.0 Checklist Module 2 (Sections 2.01-2.11).
scope: All aspects of farm operations for fresh produce cultivation including pre-harvest agricultural water, growing site management, worker hygiene, equipment and harvest crew practices

sections.title: Title & Document Control
sections.contentGuidance: Document identification (number, title, version, dates), approval signatures, distribution list

sections.title: Purpose / Objective
sections.contentGuidance: Why this document exists, what it achieves, business and compliance drivers for farm food safety

sections.title: Scope
sections.contentGuidance: What farm operations/areas covered, crop types, who is responsible, any exclusions or limitations

sections.title: Definitions & Abbreviations
sections.contentGuidance: Minimum 5-8 relevant terms: GAP, agricultural water, soil amendments, harvest crew, food contact surfaces, etc.

sections.title: Roles & Responsibilities
sections.contentGuidance: Farm manager, food safety coordinator, supervisors, workers - specific duties for each role

sections.title: Prerequisites & Reference Documents
sections.contentGuidance: Related SOPs, Primus GFS Module 2, FSMA Produce Safety Rule, worker training materials

sections.title: Hazard / Risk Analysis
sections.contentGuidance: Site-specific hazards (water contamination, animal intrusion, adjacent land risks), risk assessment, preventive controls

sections.title: Procedures
sections.contentGuidance: Detailed procedures for water management, site maintenance, worker hygiene, harvest practices (minimum 10-15 steps)

sections.title: Monitoring Plan
sections.contentGuidance: What to monitor (water quality, site conditions, hygiene compliance), frequencies, responsible parties, acceptance criteria

sections.title: Verification & Validation Activities
sections.contentGuidance: Water testing verification, site inspections, hygiene audits, equipment cleaning validation

sections.title: Corrective & Preventive Action (CAPA) Protocol
sections.contentGuidance: Triggers (water test failures, animal intrusion, hygiene violations), investigation, containment, root cause, actions, verification

sections.title: Traceability & Recall Elements
sections.contentGuidance: Growing area identification, harvest records, traceability from field to pack, water source tracking

sections.title: Record Retention & Document Control
sections.contentGuidance: Farm records (water tests, site inspections, training, harvest logs), retention periods (24+ months), storage

sections.title: Compliance Crosswalk
sections.contentGuidance: Table mapping Primus Code | Requirement | Document Section | Evidence

sections.title: Revision History & Approval Signatures
sections.contentGuidance: Revision table (version, date, description) and signature lines (Prepared By, Reviewed By, Approved By)
